confidence: We believe that every woman deserves to feel confident, stylish, and empowered.
lookAndFeelBest: Whether you're looking for trendy clothing, comfortable shoes, stylish accessories, or beauty products that will help you look and feel your best, we've got you covered.
moneySavingContent: We offer great deals and discounts on a regular basis, so you can save your money while still looking and feeling great.
secureShoppingContent: We take extra measures to ensure that your shopping experience with us is secure and worry-free.
fastDeliveryContent: We provide fast and reliable delivery options to get your products to you in no time.
userFriendlyContent: Our easy-to-navigate interface makes finding your favorite products or making purchases a breeze.
welcomeText: Welcome to YouGo, where quality and style come together to bring you the best shopping experience possible.
prideText: We take great pride in curating a collection of fashion and lifestyle products that are not only stylish but also of the highest quality.
trustedByCustomers: Trusted by 100,000+ customers all over the world
fundedByEU: Funded by the European Union. findSomething: Find something that catches your eyes!
noItemsInShop: There are no items in the shop at the moment
noMatchedItems: There are no items that match your search input
meetSellerAtSafePlace: Meet the seller at a safe public place
inspectGoods: Inspect the goods to make sure they meet your needs
checkDocumentation: Check all documentation and only pay if you're satisfied
whyYouGoTitle: Why You Should Sell on YouGo
largeActiveCommunity: A large and active community: Reach buyers who appreciate handcrafted goods like yours.
specializedCategory: Specialized category: Stand out from the crowd with dedicated exposure for handmade clothing.
lowFees: Low fees: Keep more of your profits and grow your business.
easyToUse: Easy to use: List your items and manage your shop with ease.
